page.title: 17Children's views of Herm.
page.content: Only forty people live on Herm. All the houses are near each other. There are no cars. Most people live in one village. Our friends are close when we want to play. There is a grassy common for playing. We all live near the sea. Shell and Belvoir are the best shrimping beaches. There is only one school and one teacher. We get milk straight from the farm. There are a lot of cows. Herm is a very peaceful island. We all help each other. All our families help to run the island. Every year thousands of people visit Herm.
